title: patch 6.9 loading problem?
body: SO, i am new to the game and I just downloaded it. IT started downloading the patch but it keeps scanning the files and its past 12k now. should I be worried.

replies.body:
Nope!  Sometimes it can take a long time to scan files as the patcher checks for possible corruption with previously downloaded files.  Just sit tight and let it scan.  As long as you don't get an error message, it will eventually stop and patch normally.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other issues!

Please, help me i had this problem (bug)from patch 6.4 to patch 6.7 ad it was fixed at patch 6.8 and now it returned AGAIN at patch 6.9.This problem is very big as it stops me from playing the game and i love this game.Whenever I am in the loading screen of the champions my ping goes from 80 ping to 300 and the game crashes and whenever I try to recconect the game crashes again.Please fix it.By the way sorry for my bad english . I have all the programs that the game told me to install.I even unistalled and reinstalled LOL again and still there is the same problem.Thanks for reading this letter.I appriecate your help any time. :)

My league keeps stopping patching at 33%. Ive turned off my firewall, stopped my Anti-Virus, used both launchers, still hits 33% and says  "An unspecified error occurred, please check logs for more information"
Any help on this?
Um, my patcher is on Step 2/2 and it says it's applying patches but has been stuck at 53% for the past few hours. Is there something wrong with my patcher or do I have to wait it out?
Im pretty sure you wait it out otherwise it might get worse. hope this helped <3

My patcher started scanning files at about 7, and when it got to 20000 files, i just closed it hoping it would be ok. For the past 4 hours it's been scanning files... The number keeps rising and it is at 33171 FILES AND 33%. PLEASE HELP ME. Thanks (:

I've had a similar problem for some other patches and I just had to wait it out. The amount of files the patcher scanned for me was over 80K so I just left it on at night and checked it in the morning and it was done. Hopefully, this will work for you too.
Why cant i play game,it just saying error,failed to join queue.My last game game crashed,not by me.Will I have leaver buster?
